thread.title: KGL Resources appoints Denis Wood as non-executive director
thread.title_full: KGL Resources appoints Denis Wood as non-executive director | MENAFN.COM

author: ProactiveInvestors  Australia
title: KGL Resources appoints Denis Wood as non-executive director
text:
(MENAFN - ProactiveInvestors) KGL Resources ( ASX:KGL ) has added to its board with the appointment of Denis Wood as an independent non-executive director.

Wood brings experience in the development and operation of significant resource projects along with in financing and investment.

He is a qualified metallurgist and geologist with over 45 yearsâ€™ experience and spent 13 years with BHP Billiton ( ASX:BHP ).

KGL is expected to reveal within days the resource upgrade for its Jervois copper-silver-gold project in the Northern Territory.

Jervois currently hosts 25.3 million tonnes at 1.1% copper and 22.1g/t silver for 280000 tonnes copper and 18 million ounces silver.

The upgrade will include about 20000 metres of drilling and be followed by an updated Pre-Feasibility Study in around October 2015.

Jervois also has existing mining leases in place that makes the permitting and approvals process simpler and faster.
 
Proactive Investors Australia is the market leader in producing news articles and research reports on ASX emerging companies with distribution in Australia UK North America and Hong Kong / China.
